template.name: Template App Etcd by HTTP
template.description:
Get Etcd metrics by HTTP agent.
Template tooling version used: 0.36

item.name: Etcd: Cluster version
item.description: Version of the Etcd cluster.

trigger.name: Etcd: Cluster version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Etcd version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Etcd: CPU
item.description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.

item.name: Etcd: DB size
item.description: Total size of the underlying database.

item.name: Etcd: Deletes per second
item.description: The number of deletes seen by this member per second.

item.name: Etcd: Events sent per second
item.description: The number of events sent by this member per second

item.name: Etcd: Pending events
item.description: Total number of pending events to be sent.

item.name: Etcd: RPCs received per second
item.description: The number of RPC stream messages received on the server.

item.name: Etcd: RPCs sent per second
item.description: The number of gRPC stream messages sent by the server.

item.name: Etcd: RPCs started per second
item.description: The number of RPCs started on the server.

item.name: Etcd: Server has a leader
item.description: Whether or not a leader exists. 1 is existence, 0 is not.

trigger.name: Etcd: Member has no leader
trigger.description: "If a member does not have a leader, it is totally unavailable."

item.name: Etcd: HTTP 4XX
item.description: Number of handle failures of requests (non-watches), by method (GET/PUT etc.), and code 4XX.

item.name: Etcd: HTTP 5XX
item.description: Number of handle failures of requests (non-watches), by method (GET/PUT etc.), and code 5XX.

trigger.name: Etcd: Too many HTTP requests failures (over {$ETCD.HTTP.FAIL.MAX.WARN} for 5m)'
trigger.description: "Too many reqvests failed on etcd instance with 5xx HTTP code"

item.name: Etcd: HTTP requests received
item.description: Number of requests received into the system (successfully parsed and authd).

item.name: Etcd: Server is a leader
item.description: Whether or not this member is a leader. 1 if is, 0 otherwise.

trigger.name: Etcd: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes

item.name: Etcd: Keys compacted per second
item.description: The number of DB keys compacted per second.

item.name: Etcd: Keys expired per second
item.description: The number of expired keys per second.

item.name: Etcd: Keys total
item.description: Total number of keys.

item.name: Etcd: Leader changes
item.description: The the number of leader changes the member has seen since its start.

trigger.name: Etcd: Instance has seen too many leader changes (over {$ETCD.LEADER.CHANGES.MAX.WARN} for 15m)'
trigger.description: Rapid leadership changes impact the performance of etcd significantly. It also signals that the leader is unstable, perhaps due to network connectivity issues or excessive load hitting the etcd cluster.

item.name: Etcd: Maximum open file descriptors
item.description: The Maximum number of open file descriptors.

item.name: Etcd: Client gRPC received bytes per second
item.description: The number of bytes received from grpc clients per second

item.name: Etcd: Client gRPC sent bytes per second
item.description: The number of bytes sent from grpc clients per second

item.name: Etcd: Open file descriptors
item.description: Number of open file descriptors.

item.name: Etcd: Proposals applied per second
item.description: The number of consensus proposals applied.

item.name: Etcd: Proposals committed per second
item.description: The number of consensus proposals committed.

item.name: Etcd: Proposals failed per second
item.description: The number of failed proposals seen.

trigger.name: Etcd: Too many proposal failures (over {$ETCD.PROPOSAL.FAIL.MAX.WARN} for 5m)'
trigger.description: "Normally related to two issues: temporary failures related to a leader election or longer downtime caused by a loss of quorum in the cluster."

item.name: Etcd: Proposals pending
item.description: The current number of pending proposals to commit.

trigger.name: Etcd: Too many proposals are queued to commit (over {$ETCD.PROPOSAL.PENDING.MAX.WARN} for 5m)'
trigger.description: "Rising pending proposals suggests there is a high client load or the member cannot commit proposals."

item.name: Etcd: PUT per second
item.description: The number of puts seen by this member per second.

item.name: Etcd: Range per second
item.description: The number of ranges seen by this member per second.

item.name: Etcd: Reads per second
item.description: Number of reads action by (get/getRecursive), local to this member.

item.name: Etcd: Resident memory
item.description: Resident memory size in bytes.

item.name: Etcd: Server version
item.description: Version of the Etcd server.

trigger.name: Etcd: Server version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Etcd version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Etcd: Transaction per second
item.description: The number of transactions seen by this member per second.

item.name: Etcd: Uptime
item.description: Etcd server uptime.

item.name: Etcd: Virtual memory
item.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.

item.name: Etcd: Writes per second
item.description: Number of writes (e.g. set/compareAndDelete) seen by this member.

item_prototype.name: Etcd: RPCs completed with code {#GRPC.CODE}
item_prototype.description: The number of RPCs completed on the server with grpc_code {#GRPC.CODE}

trigger_prototype.name: Etcd: Too many failed gRPC requests with code: {#GRPC.CODE} (over {$ETCD.GRPC.ERRORS.MAX.WARN} in 5m)

item_prototype.name: Etcd: Etcd peer {#ETCD.PEER}: Bytes received
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes received from peer with ID {#ETCD.PEER}

item_prototype.name: Etcd: Etcd peer {#ETCD.PEER}: Bytes sent
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes sent to peer with ID {#ETCD.PEER}

item_prototype.name: Etcd: Etcd peer {#ETCD.PEER}: Receive failures failures
item_prototype.description: The number of receive failures from the peer with ID {#ETCD.PEER}

item_prototype.name: Etcd: Etcd peer {#ETCD.PEER}: Send failures
item_prototype.description: The number of send failures from peer with ID {#ETCD.PEER}

macro.description: Filter to exclude discovered gRPC codes https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/statuscodes.md
Filter of discoverable gRPC codes which will be create triggers
Maximum number of gRPC requests failures
Maximum number of HTTP requests failures
Maximum percentage of used file descriptors
The port of Etcd API endpoint
Maximum number of proposals in queue
Request scheme which may be http or https

trigger.expression: {Template App Etcd by HTTP:etcd.open.fds.min(5m)}/{Template App Etcd by HTTP:etcd.max.fds.last()}*100>{$ETCD.OPEN.FDS.MAX.WARN}
trigger.name: Etcd: Current number of open files is too high (over {$ETCD.OPEN.FDS.MAX.WARN}% for 5m)
trigger.description: "Heavy file descriptor usage (i.e., near the processs file descriptor limit) indicates a potential file descriptor exhaustion issue. If the file descriptors are exhausted, etcd may panic because it cannot create new WAL files."
